title: Japan ready to assist Sri Lanka improve damaged relations with West
content: Japan’s envoy Yasushi Akashi has told Sri Lankan President Mahinda Rajapaksa that Japan is willing to help his country improve relations with the West, which have been strained over human rights and war crimes accountability issues.In a news briefing, Akashi said he told Rajapaksa that Japan is ‘willing to assist in the efforts to develop…
